name: Humalien Conquerer
description:
Hey there,

Please consider downloading the windows build. The WebGl version runs out of memory!

So this is my first game ever made. I got 2 years programming experience but never touched game development. So i thougth now it should be the time. I had just one day but this i fully used.

Working-Time: ~20 hours

Controls:

Movement: WASD/ARROW Keys

Shoot: Left Mouse

Build: Space bar

Tutorials used:
